item.title: Making this code delta
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

It’s amazing to see how much you all don’t know. Please go read a tutorial or something. For some reason, it’s actually frustrating me to know we have such idiots here. You all require to be spoon fed. Do something for yourself.

Resource: http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/reallybigindex.html

Use that and don’t bother to post again until you know something.

item.title: Making this code delta
item.dc:creator: @mod_lol1 mod_lol1
item.description:
@mod_lol1 wrote:

please someone make this code delta!!!

if (NpcDialogue == 29) { NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; if (playerIsMember == 0) { if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 100000000)) { try { sendMessage("You Are Now A Member!"); BufferedWriter bw = null; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true)); bw.write(""+playerName+""); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); disconnected = false; } catch(IOException ioexception) { misc.println("membership.txt: error loading file."); } deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 100000000); playerIsMember = 1; } else { sendMessage("You dont have enough money to become a member!"); } } else { sendMessage("You are already a member!"); }}

I know the sendmessage sM please!!

Read full topic
